hovertTankGroundWaterShallow_TurnMoveDir.AltName: [Tank: Hover - Shallow Water] Correction Limit Angle: Y
hovertTankGroundWaterShallow_TurnMoveDir.Wiki: Maximum angle (Y) when correcting in the direction of movement.

hovertTankGroundWaterShallow_TurnMoveDir.AltName: [Tank: Hover - Shallow Water] Movement Correction Type
hovertTankGroundWaterShallow_TurnMoveDir.Wiki: If you want the booster to point to the right when the character moves to the left, set it to the opposite direction.
